data.title: Noomi Rapace
data.text:
AKA Noomi Norén

Born: 28-Dec-1979

Birthplace: Hudiksvall, Gävleborgs län, Sweden

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: Sweden

Executive summary: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

Father: Rogelio Durán (flamenco singer, "Rogelio Dabargos", b. 1953, d. 2007)

Mother: Nina Norén (actress)

Husband: Ola Rapace (actor, m. 2001, filed for div., one son)

Son: Lev (b. 2005)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

Close (18-Jan-2019)

Stockholm (19-Apr-2018)

Bright (22-Dec-2017)

What Happened to Monday (6-Aug-2017)

Unlocked (24-Apr-2017)

Child 44 (15-Apr-2015)

The Drop (5-Sep-2014)

Dead Man Down (8-Mar-2013)

Passion (7-Sep-2012)

Prometheus (30-May-2012) · Elizabeth Shaw

Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows (14-Dec-2011) · Madam Simza Heron

Beyond (6-Sep-2010)

The Girl Who Kicked the Hornet's Nest (27-Nov-2009)

The Girl Who Played with Fire (18-Sep-2009)

The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (27-Feb-2009) · Lisbeth Salander

Daisy Diamond (28-Sep-2007)
